aboutUsText1: "Rysgally Metal" hojalyk jemgyyeti  specializes in manufacturing a wide range of high quality metal products at affordable prices in Turkmenistan. At our manufacturing plant:
aboutUsText11: Our high-quality products are intended for long-term use in various weather conditions, and are distinguished by their safety and protection. Our products are distinguished by the fact that they do not change color or corrode in sunlight, oil and other situations using advanced technologies and high-quality powder paints.
aboutUsText12: Our import substitute goods are offered to customers at favorable prices. Our company gives special importance to the quality of the products produced. Any manufactured products are provided with 1-year free service and warranty.
infoBox1Text: Making goods in various dimensions based on design as per customer's requirements
infoBox2Text: Stainless and high temperature resistant powder coating
infoBox3Text: All products are provided with 1 year free service and warranty
infoBox4Text: Our products meet all the required standards
